channel.title: Todayilearned on Life & Technological Journey of Samina

item.title: [TIL] 5G 與 Kubernetes 的一些資料
item.description: 因為要開始面對準備論文的參考文件，加上對 5G 不熟，所以從 Video 開始來看。 找到一些蠻不錯的影片，下面分別對這些影片做個間單的描述。 ⭐ Migrating the Next Generation Mobile Core Towards 5G with Kubernetes - Karla Saur, Intel - Published on 12 Jul 2018 ⭐ Kaloom Kaloom SDF Features - Published on 27 Nov 2018 Kubernetes Integration with Kaloom SDF - Published on 11 Dec 2018 The Telco Networking Journey to Cloud Native: The Good, Bad, and Ugly - Heather Kirksey - Published on 15 Dec 2018 Keynote: Opening Remarks and Networking Journey to CNFs - Arpit Joshipura & Dan Kohn - Published on 26 Sep 2018 1.
